English: A tasty and classic red apple!
Catalan: Una deliciosa i classica poma vermella!
Spanish: Una deliciosa y clasica manzana roja!

English: You sense a vague magical force emmanating from this weapon...
Catalan: Sents una vaga aura magica emanant d'aquest arma...
Spanish: Sientes una vaga aura magica emanando de este arma...

English: It's not red. Maybe you shouldn't drink it.
Catalan: No es vermella. Potser no te l'hauries de beure.
Spanish: No es roja. Alomejor no te la tendrias que beber

English: It's red and square-like. You feel like you've seen this before
Catalan: Es vermella i quadrada. Fa pinta de que has vist aixo en un altre lloc
